teaching.title: Tutors in Action Malaysia
teaching.details: Provided scheduled Additional Mathematics tutoring to Malaysian Certificate of Education (SPM) candidates impacted by class disruptions and limited access to affordable tuition. Created online learning modules and study resources for Malaysian high school students.

teaching.title: University of Michigan- Mathematics
teaching.details: Provided walk-in tutoring for undergraduate students in Calculus I, II, Multivariable and Vector Calculus, Linear Algebra, and Intro Probability.

teaching.title: University of Michigan- Computer Science and Engineering (CSE)
teaching.details: Designed classroom activities, facilitated weekly discussion sections, and held office hours. Course topics: Algorithm design, computability (finite automata, Turing Machines, Turing reductions), complexity theory (P & NP, NP-hard, NP-Completeness, heuristics), cryptography (Diffie-Hellman, RSA).
